name: Please Tell Me I Love You
name_original: Please Tell Me I Love You
description:
A short conversation about a relationship. Made for My First Game Jam.

Please enable full screen mode when you play! It wasn't ment to be played in a window-viwer!

2/9/2016 - minor view-port scrollbar issue fixed

1/19/2016_02- Completed!

1/19/2016_01- Added more art assets!

1/16/2016 - still in development and in need of many art assets. Hopefully will be be completed by 1/19/2016
